New Records: Tom Thibodeau became the fifth coach in New York Knicks' history to reach 200 wins
Key Match Events: A brutal fight broke out in the bleachers between two fans during the Knicks vs. Raptors game
Pre-Game Insights: The Knicks were expected to win against the Raptors, who have been struggling with a 9th loss in their last 10 games
Post-Match Reflections: Tom Thibodeau expressed his satisfaction at his players' hustle and mental fortitude, and praised their improvement after a 'low-energy' defeat to Orlando
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Knicks' victory marked a crucial step towards the championship, and they now face a tough challenge against the Oklahoma City Thunder
Others: The Raptors remain prime contenders to land premium lottery picks in the 2025 NBA Draft
